Texts.Eng: The ^orange;Honey Jarrer^reset; creates ^orange;Honey Jars^reset; with different effects, depending on the combs you centrifuge. It's up to you to experiment!

To make the most out of your bee farm, you'll want to harvest honey. Try to build a ^orange;Honey Jarrer^reset; and place it next to your Industrial Centrifuge to aid with this process. Toss in some ^orange;empty bottles^reset; while you're at it.
